greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, iterates of X * [1,0,0,0,...]; where X = an infinite bidiagonal matrix with [1,-2,1,-2,1,...] in the main diagonal, [1,1,1,...] in the subdiagonal and the rest zeros.
